summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with a General Maintenance Worker (and Acting Facilities Manager) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of the OIG's investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The document references attachments including the interview transcript and related records.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation into his death while housed at MCC New York. He is identified by his register number 76318-054.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP maintenance worker on August 5, 2021, as part of the Epstein death investigation.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Conducted the voluntary interview of the BOP maintenance worker on August 5, 2021, alongside the Senior Special Agent.

persons.name: General Maintenance Worker
persons.role: Acting Facilities Manager, BOP MCC New York
persons.context: The individual interviewed by OIG agents regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein. He served as Acting Facilities Manager during part of Epstein's incarceration.

connections.description: The Senior Special Agent interviewed the maintenance worker as part of the OIG investigation into Epstein's death.
The Special Agent participated in interviewing the maintenance worker regarding the Epstein investigation.
The maintenance worker was the Acting Facilities Manager at MCC New York during the time Epstein was housed there.

events.title: OIG Interview of BOP Maintenance Worker
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ OIG conducted a voluntary, recorded interview with a General Maintenance Worker (Acting Facilities Manager) from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Facilities Manager Out of Office Notification
events.description: An email was generated regarding an automated out-of-office message for the Facilities Manager (referenced as an attachment to the OIG report).

events.title: MCC New York Camera Service Request
events.description: A SigNet service request was made regarding camera issues at MCC New York (referenced as an attachment to the OIG report).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) was actively investigating the death of Jeffrey Epstein as of August 2021, conducting interviews with BOP staff.
A General Maintenance Worker, who also served as Acting Facilities Manager at MCC New York during Epstein's incarceration, was interviewed.

The interview was recorded and transcribed, and the memorandum references attachments including the transcript and documents related to facilities management and camera systems at MCC New York from August 2019.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum that states it contains no recommendations or conclusions and is not to be distributed outside the receiving agency.
